body:
**About the expiry date**

The expiry date of your caution is based on:

* what you told us about your caution
* the current law on when cautions expire

This table shows you what you told us. If any of this information is wrong, the expiry date we've given you might also be wrong.

 | | |
|---|---|
| Criminal record type | **Caution**|
| Type of Caution | **Conditional** |
| Age at time of caution | **Under 18** |
| Date caution given | **Not known**|
| Conditions stuck to | **Yes** |
___

components.html:
If you need to change any information, or if you have another caution or conviction youâ€™d like to check, [use the service again](/).

**[Print this page](/)**

heading: Your caution expired on the day conditions ended
lede: You do not need to tell anyone about this caution unless an [exception applies](https://www.gov.uk/exoffenders-and-employment?#when-employers-still-need-to-know-about-your-conviction).
